original_text: and on the vine were three branches. As soon as it budded, it blossomed, and its clusters ripened into grapes.
korean_text: 그 나무에 세 가지가 있고 싹이 나서 꽃이 피고 포도송이가 익었고

sentences.original_text: and on the vine were three branches.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 포도나무에 세 가지 가지가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and its clusters ripened into grapes.
